IIUC, a sequence cannot be updated. So if all the children are read-only that indirectly makes the sequence also read-only?
If that is the case, if the following check evaluates to true, can't we set the frozen flag to true here? That way in the read-only scenario, we can avoid going through all the children over and over again?
timeline.author: MaryamZi
